Articles.Content: Hi, I built a space station around minmus and everything was going great until it started wobbling without any apparent reason. I've tried turning of SAS, retracting the solar array (where the wobbling is beginning),  and undocking everything. Still doesn't work! Anyone got a quick fix? Is it a known bug?
Pics? I can't say for sure what it is, but I often experience this too when my craft's center of mass is off.
